t: Amazon HQ2 Artist
s: Working closely with the Amazon design and project teams, Indiewalls led the art curation, sourcing, production, and installation of the art collection at Amazon HQ2. The collection was inspired by the design narrative and brand voice set by the Amazon team.

t: The Work of Art in the Age of Amazon | The New Yorker
s: August 20, 2013 - Without the restrictions of a physical gallery space, Amazon Art seems to go on forever—a fun-house hallway of meticulously counted works of art.

t: Introducing-Amazon-Art - US Press Center
s: October 24, 2022 - The Amazon Art store demystifies the world of art and allows every customer the chance to enjoy a gallery experience.
